dialogue.introduction: Hagikaze, 17th Ship of the Kagerou-class Destroyer, reporting! Commander, please give me your orders! Hagikaze, 4th Destroyer Division, in position. Commander, please give me your orders!
dialogue.library_intro: I am Hagikaze, the 17th ship of the Kagerou-class Destroyer. I was born in Uraga. I worked diligently as part of the 4th Destroyer Division with Arashi. Being the escort of the Nagumo Taskforce, I took part in the unforgiving battle in the Solomon Islands. I was with Arashi on my last night to. Please remember us, the 4th Destroyer Division.
dialogue.secretary2: Commander, if there is anything I can do, please let me know. I will do my best.
dialogue.secretary3: Listen, listen! You know what?! Oh, my! Commander! I’m such an idiot. I’m s-sorry!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, did you see Arashi? Huh, you haven’t? Come on, what in the world is she up to? I will give her a good talk about this next time.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander? Huh? “Are you fine with the night now?” Yes. I still can’t get myself to like the night, but I am okay now. Commander can you put your hand here please. It calms me.
dialogue.wedding: Commander? What’s up? Do you have something for the 4th Destroyer Division? Should I go get Arashi? Huh, that’s not it? Me? This is…?! T-Thank you! I… will cherish it greatly!
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander. Ah, you want to check the situation? Roger that. I will bring you the report.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: 4th Destroyer Division, Hagikaze! Setting sail!  4th Destroyer Division, 1st Platoon, Hagikaze! Leaving port!
dialogue.equipment1: This equipment, I'm happy for it.
dialogue.equipment2: I am not that fond of the night.  The night, I… No, it’s fine!
dialogue.supply: Thank you. I am ready to go again.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Sorry for causing such trouble, Commander. I will take a short leave from the ranks.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: The night… The night is still haunting. When I enter the bath, it just comes back to me.  Fwah. When I get into the bath like this… Huh? I wonder if the Commander remembered to get some food.
dialogue.ship_construction: Construction of a new ship has been completed. Wonderful!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet is returning. Welcome back, everyone!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Ready, everyone? Fleet, Flagship Hagikaze, leaving port!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemies… Where are the enemies? F-Found them! Enemy vessel sighted! Fleet, ready torpedoes and guns portside!
dialogue.night_battle: The night… The night sea is scary! But for now, I must go! All ships, forward! The night… The night sea is dangerous. But I will continue on! All ships, follow me! It’s night battle!
dialogue.night_attack: Open fire! Hagikaze, engaging the enemy!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Open fire! Hagikaze, engaging the enemy!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Open fire! Hagikaze, engaging the enemy!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Open fire! Hagikaze, engaging the enemy!
dialogue.mvp: Huh? Me? Hagikaze is… the MVP? That’s all thanks to everyone from the 4th. Thanks, everyone.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: What?! N-no! Can I keep going?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Hyaaa! D-did the rudder get hit?! Can it be fixed? Please!
dialogue.sunk: With this wound… there is no hope of returning… Arashi?! I... will be leaving you here. Good… bye.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, commander. I made a low-fat cake by minimizing the use of butter and sugar. Oh, you would like to try? With pleasure. Say ahh~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Umm... I need to prepare Toshikoshi soba after the spring cleaning. Is winter vegetable as tempura fine for you?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Admiral. The 4th Destroyer Division will be under your guidance this year as well. Ah, me as well.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Sendai, are you really fine with being the demon for this year's Setsubun? Will it be alright? Ah, well, here's the mask. Ah-! Arashi! Aaah, you idiot!

hourly.0000: Commander, the date has just changed. Today I, Hagikaze, will be the secretary ship. I'm counting on your guidance.
hourly.0100: It's 01:00. Commander, night is after all a bit... scary isn't it? Ah, no! It's alright!
hourly.0200: Commander, it's 02:00. Is the commander completely fine with nights? As expected of the commander!
hourly.0300: It's 03:...00. *Scream* Co-Commander, please don't surprise me like that. I get really scared after all...jeez~.
hourly.0400: 04:...00. Soon... Won't it become morning soon? Morning Sun... hurry!
hourly.0500: 05:00! Commander, it's morning! It's dawn you know! I'll go prepare breakfast, alright? Huh? It's still too early?
hourly.0600: It's 06:00. The fleet, all hands, get up! It's mo~rning! Commander, this time for sure I'll go prepare breakfast. Please wait!
hourly.0700: 07:00. Here~, Hagikaze's healthy morning meal! Wheat rice with a precious vegetables side dish, burdock and tofu miso sauce and pickles! Enjoy your meal♪
hourly.0800: It's 08:00. Commander, Please wait a bit while I clean up the dishes. Mornings are nice aren't they~, Mornings, I like them!
hourly.0900: It's 09:00. Commander, sorry to have kept you waiting. Which mission will you start with first today? Or will you observe a ship's remodelling?
hourly.1000: 10:0-...Ah! Nowaki, Maikaze, thank you for your hard work. Ah, Arashi? No, I haven't seen her. Next time, let's have a girl's meet with all of DesDiv 4. Commander, will you participate?
hourly.1100: It's 11:00. Commander, what will you have for lunch? How about Hagikaze's special root vegetable curry? Is it really ok? Yes, Please wait!
hourly.1200: 12:00. Commander, please enjoy the special root vegetable curry♪ It's main point is the combination of the carrots, burdock, wild yam and lotus root. It's also good for your health.
hourly.1300: It's 13:00. Commander, the special root vegetable curry was surprisingly delicious wasn't it? It's also good for the bowels. I'll make it again next time.
hourly.1400: It's 14:00. Commander...? Ah, the escort and relief of the special aircraft carrier? ...yeah... but, I believe that somewhere in this ocean, we'll meet again.
hourly.1500: 15:0-...Ah, Kaga! On that occasion...Oh, no, I'm sorry. U-Um... Ah, yes! Thank you very much! I'll work hard!
hourly.1600: 16:00. It's right, I couldn't protect... yes, Nisshin too... But... But! I believe... that we'll meet again. Yes!
hourly.1700: Ah... Sorry commander, I was stuck admiring the sunset. The current time is 17:00.
hourly.1800: It's 18:00. Commander, what will you have for dinner? Is it alright if I do it again...Eh? Sendai will...with Me and Arashi? *groan*
hourly.1900: 19:00. Excuse me Admiral. DesDiv4 along with the light cruiser Sendai will sortie in a transport mission. Um, I'm sorry it is little, but I left some rice balls for you. If you want them.
hourly.2000: 20:00. Sendai, Shigure, Kawakaze, DesDiv4's Arashi and Hagikaze are attached to the navigation order. At the local, it'll become a nighttime breakthrough...
hourly.2100: 21:00. This night... I have a bad, bad feeling... Everyone, be careful! Eh? Shigure, what is it? Eh!? Enemies!? An ambush!?
hourly.2200: It's... 22:...00. Somehow... somehow we survived this night. Shigure, Kawakaze, thank you. Nights are...scary after all
hourly.2300: It's 23:00. Admiral. Hagikaze, DesDiv4, have safely returned. ...Ah, you ate the rice balls didn't you? Again... I'll make them again, ok?
